articles.title: January Update 1.13.0 - ARC Raiders
articles.description: ARC Raiders is a multiplayer extraction adventure, set in a lethal future earth, ravaged by a mysterious mechanized threat known as ARC.

articles.title: Rumour: Switch Online GameCube Releases Might Have Been Leaked - Nintendo Life
Cyberpunk roguelike action game ReBlade: The Death Spiral announced for PC - Gematsu
articles.description: Publisher Spiral Up Games and Loulan: The Cursed Sand developer ChillyRoom have announced cyberpunk roguelike action game ReBlade: The Death Spiral for PC (Steam). A release date was not announced.

articles.title: Apple updates iOS 12 to extend iMessage and FaceTime support on older devices - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Apple has released iOS 12.5.8 for a small group of older devices, to make sure they can continue using FaceTime and iMessage.

articles.title: 10+ Things to Know About the New AirTag 2 - MacRumors
articles.description: After a five year wait, Apple finally unveiled the next-generation version of the AirTag earlier today. The AirTag 2 looks exactly like the original...

articles.title: 430,000-Year-Old Stick Found in Greece Among Humanity's Oldest Wooden Tools - ScienceAlert
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) – Two artifacts found at a lake shore in Greece are the oldest wooden tools to be uncovered so far and date back 430,000 years.
